author: sburgin "That Review Chick"

review: Set up for the Fire TV stick could not have been easier. It is truly plug and play! All the cables and batteries were included and we were able to set up our non-Smart TV within minutes. The app for Amazon is excellent ( unlike the Amazon app on our Vizio Smart TV) and the speed of movies loading was really good. On our vizio it takes a few seconds for the movie to load but there is barely a blip before content loads on the Fire stick.The fact that you can use your phone instead of the remote to search for movies and control the device is a definite plus. The remote for the fire stick is small and I can see it easily getting misplaced so it will be good to have a backup app on the phone to use as a remote. The fact that the app on the phone allows for a voice search of content is even better!I already have the Amazon Prime membership and this device only makes it more perfect. My kids loved that the Prime songs that they streamed through the fire stick actually showed the lyrics so they could 'sing' along.Highly recommended!

review: Much better than the Roku stick.  It streams well, but you need to plug it into a power source.
